title: Remove anniversary date example/hint text from access gate UI

requirements.text: Remove any example or hint text for the anniversary date from the AnniversaryGate UI so the gate does not display a sample date or formatting guidance text.

quotes: Don't give example for the anniversary date

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/components/AnniversaryGate.tsx, the anniversary date <Input> no longer displays a placeholder containing an example date (e.g., remove the current "e.g., 13 June 2020").
The helper/hint text below the input (currently describing the date format) is removed so the UI provides no date-entry hints.
No user-facing text within the AnniversaryGate UI contains the expected anniversary date string or any sample anniversary date.
The gate validation behavior remains unchanged (it still validates against the expected date in frontend/src/lib/anniversaryGate.ts).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain single-actor; no additional backend services.
nonGoals: Changing the expected anniversary date value used for validation.
Changing date normalization/validation rules beyond removing UI examples/hints.
Adding backend persistence or user accounts beyond existing Internet Identity support.
